abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and resurfaces at a target location, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Burrowstrike travels in a straight line, and the stun duration is the same on each level.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fierce sand storm, damaging all enemies caught within it. Sand King becomes invisible while in the sandstorm.
abilities.notes: Sand King becomes invisible while in Sand Storm.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks infect the target with a poisonous sting that slows their movement speed. If the target dies while under this effect, it explodes, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: If the target dies while under the effect, it deals AoE damage.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends out a series of damaging pulse waves that slow enemies caught in their wake. The slowing effect stacks with each pulse and reaches its maximum value.
abilities.notes: Requires successful channeling. Each pulse increases the slow effect.
